title: Highlights font
content:
Does anyone have a clue as to the name of this font? In the least, perhaps something similar? ![highlights](http://web.archive.org/web/20080401010226im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/10740.gif)

 [‹ (x) San Diego State - Gills Sans Bd XC {Tiff}](http://web.archive.org/web/20080401010226/http:/www.typophile.com/node/121 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Dallas Mavericks logo - TF Cavalier A Bold {Yves} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080401010226/http:/www.typophile.com/node/104 "Go to next forum topic")
author: denali

comments.content:
Ouch. If that's an existing font, it has been   
intensively modified, so that's gonna be a tough   
cookie to crack. Let the hunt begin!
I'm hoping the uppercase H, as well as the lowercase h,l,and i will behold some clue. The s has definately been altered and descenders of the g's.
